Title: Ep. 72 - Security Newbie (Chris Palmer)
Description: Chris Palmer spends his time thinking about how to make a browser more secure. But security is a broad concept that can mean different things to different people, and part of a developer’s job is balancing those needs. We talk to Chris about how he makes security decisions and what new developers should consider when thinking about security in the products they build. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
